extensionDescription.message: Capture the active tab and download it with options like format, quality, coloring, full page or not...

noCaptureNotificationTitle.description: Notification title when tab can't be captured

noCaptureNotificationMessage.message: This page can't be captured with current CapturePage's options. Maybe with tabs.captureTab()...
noCaptureNotificationMessage.description: Notification message when tab can't be captured

menuLaunch.description: Context Menu Title for capture a tab

menuOpenOption.description: Context Menu Title for going to the add-on's options

folderChoiceTitle.message: Folder where the file will be downloaded (relative path to the Downloads folder)
folderChoiceTitle.description: Description for the folder choice's option

folderPrecisions.message: If the name doesn't exist, a folder will be automatically created. If you want to create subfolder(s) or put the file in, you have to use "/" (as for a path). Be careful not to put spaces or special characters in front or behind them otherwise they will be removed

patternChoiceTitle.description: Description for the filename choice's option

patternPrecisions.message: Some specials characters will be removed and if the file name is too long the download will fail

captureTypeTitle.description: Description for the capture type choice's option

precisionsWithTabsAPI.message: The tabs.captureTab() function allow to capture some web pages which can't be captured otherwise (but only the visible part and in colour)
precisionsWithTabsAPI.description: Explanation on the Tabs API's capture choice

formatTitle.description: Description for the format choice's option

labelJpeg.message: JPEG (the image's quality can only be ajust with this format)

qualityImage.message: Image's quality (only available for jpeg format) :
qualityImage.description: Description for the quality choice's option

labelColoring.description: Description for the coloring choice's option

checkBoxSpaceTitle.description: Description for the spaces choice's option

checkBoxAllSpecialsTitle.message: Replace all specials characters in filename by "-"
checkBoxAllSpecialsTitle.description: Description for the specials characters choice's option

alertColourTabsAPI.message: in colour (grayscale not available for this kind of capture)
alertColourTabsAPI.description: Alert for coloring when Capture with Tabs API chosen

alertQualityImagePNG.message: can't be chosen for png format
alertQualityImagePNG.description: Alert for image quality when format PNG chosen

alertQualityImageTitle.description: Alert text for image quality presentation

alertFolderChoiceTitle.description: Alert text for folder choice presentation

alertPatternChoiceTitle.description: Alert text for pattern choice presentation

checkBoxAlertSavedParameterTitle.message: Show a summary Alert of Saved Parameters
checkBoxAlertSavedParameterTitle.description: Description for the Alert Saved Parameters choice's option
